arts.sum: Niko Kovac shares his delight after BVB further closed the gap with European places courtesy of a stunning win in Freiburg.

arts.ttl: Dominant Dortmund strike four in Freiburg
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund produced a stunning performance away from home in their 4-1 win over SC Freiburg.

arts.ttl: Post Match Reaction: Dortmund Blow Past Freiburg to Enter Race for Europe
arts.sum: Don’t get me wrong—this win was good, and Dortmund totally deserved it, but up until the 2-0 goal at least, this game could have easily ended very differently. The expected goals for the game read 1.64 - 3.37 in favor of Dortmund, and it’s all the more satisfying when you consider just how well Freiburg have been playing this season.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund demolish Freiburg to boost European hopes
arts.sum: Carney Chukwuemeka unleashes a shot that would double Dortmund's lead early in the second half. Karim Adeyemi fires Dortmund into the lead with a clinical finish past Florian Müller.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Chukwuemeka, Adeyemi Lead BVB Past Freiburg
arts.sum: He dribbled past his man and picked out a perfect pass to Brandt, in yet another display of his excellent ability to play through pressure. It was Carney’s first start in a BVB kit, and he looked excellent.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. Borussia Dortmund preview: Significant clash with European implications
arts.sum: Freiburg welcome Borussia Dortmund to Europa-Park Stadion for a clash with huge stakes regarding the race for European football.

arts.ttl: Freiburg near record purchase of Ligue 2 striker
arts.sum: France's preeminent footballing publication reports that SC Freiburg are hopeful of completing a club record purchase soon.

arts.ttl: Freiburg ready to ‘fight’ against Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Julian Schuster has warned Borussia Dortmund his Freiburg players are ready to “fight for the cause” as they look to improve on their defeat against Union Berlin which saw the…

arts.ttl: Report: SC Freiburg in pole position to sign Irie for club record fee
arts.sum: The Breisgauers will be hoping to bring the 19-year-old talent to the Europa-Park Stadion in summer.

arts.ttl: Freiburg set to sign Troyes’ Cyriaque Irié in big-money move
arts.sum: Freiburg are set to sign ESTAC Troyes winger Cyriaque Irié (19), according to a report from L’Équipe. The Burkina Faso forward is expected to complete a big-money move to the Bundesliga…
